name: Donkey prison
description:
You have been falsely convicted for a crime and have to escape prison. 
But beware! the warden won't just let you walk out of this place, he's throwing fat prisoners at you to make sure you can't reach the key to the exit.

Credits:

Programming:

  • Joep Vink
  • Sem Evers

Graphics:

  • Sjoerd Vink
  • Kayla Roeten

Controls:

  • A D or < > to walk
  • ^ to jump 
  • ^ ˅ to move on ladders
  • esc to pause 
  • mouse to navigate menus
